messages.startupErr: An error occurred while starting the installer.
messages.bundledJreErr: This application was configured to use a bundled Java Runtime Environment but the runtime is missing or corrupted.
messages.jreVersionErr: GATE requires a Java Runtime Environment, and works best with a JDK. Click OK to download one. When installing AdoptOpenJDK you MUST enable the "JavaSoft (Oracle) registry keys" option. Minimum required Java version is
messages.launcherErr: The registry refers to a nonexistent Java Runtime Environment installation or the runtime is corrupted. Please ensure you have a valid installation of Java 8.0 or later.
